shorts.title: Passages: Who we lost in 2025
shorts.description: By Chris Kelly ckelly@scrantontimes.com A revered former mayor of Scranton, a former police officer who lit up the holidays and a local, college and NFL standout whose sudden death shocked fans and friends from West Scranton to Wisconsin top the somber list of notable deaths in 2025. A pair of trailblazers died young and a pair of beloved community pillars left the stage with legacies that live on. Who we lost in 2025: Samuel Dino Argo, 73, Pittston, known as Danny Argo, local musician who often played La Festa Italiana, and was a longtime member of Pittston City Council, July […]
shorts.content: By Chris Kelly ckelly@scrantontimes.com A revered former mayor of Scranton, a former police officer who lit up the holidays and a local, college and NFL standout whose sudden death shocked fans and friends from West Scranton to Wisconsin top the somber list of notable deaths in 2025. A pair of trailblazers died young and a pair of beloved community pillars left the stage with legacies that live on. Who we lost in 2025: Samuel Dino Argo, 73, Pittston, known as Danny Argo, local musician who often played La Festa Italiana, and was a longtime member of Pittston City Council, July […]

shorts.title: Mr. and Mrs. Steven Kropa
shorts.description: St. Adalbert’s Polish National Catholic Church was the setting Dec. 7, 2024, for the wedding of Nicole Hughes and Steven Joseph Kropa, both of Dickson City.
shorts.content: St. Adalbert’s Polish National Catholic Church was the setting Dec. 7, 2024, for the wedding of Nicole Hughes and Steven Joseph Kropa, both of Dickson City.

shorts.title: YEAR IN REVIEW: Championships, milestones and remarkable feats highlight 2025
shorts.title_distilled: YEAR IN REVIEW: Championships, milestones and remarkable feats highlight 2025.
shorts.description: As we close out 2025, we reflect on a year of success and achievement. As always, we also lost some memorable local sports figures. It was another remarkable year in local sports, capped by a rush of high school gold-medal efforts on both the individual and team levels in the fall sports season. Here’s a look back at 2025 with some significant dates and storylines that captured our attention and had our readers talking. Sweet Vic-tory Dunmore native Vic Fangio dials up a defense that shuts down Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs and enables the Philadelphia Eagles to […]

shorts.title: Remember when
shorts.description: 30 years ago Dunmore won its fourth straight Lynett Memorial Tournament championship with a 45-35 win over Scranton Prep. The Bucks’ Brian Costanzo had 10 of his 14 points in the second half to be named the MVP. Mike Skoff led the Cavaliers with 17 points. … MVP Erin Steppacher scored six of her 14 points in overtime to lift Scranton Prep over Scranton, 70-59, in the championship game of the Taylor Lions Club Tournament. … Bill Celuck scored 14 points, had 10 rebounds and four blocked shots and Mark Sakson scored a game-high 21 points to lead Valley View […]
shorts.content: 30 years ago Dunmore won its fourth straight Lynett Memorial Tournament championship with a 45-35 win over Scranton Prep. The Bucks’ Brian Costanzo had 10 of his 14 points in the second half to be named the MVP. Mike Skoff led the Cavaliers with 17 points. … MVP Erin Steppacher scored six of her 14 points in overtime to lift Scranton Prep over Scranton, 70-59, in the championship game of the Taylor Lions Club Tournament. … Bill Celuck scored 14 points, had 10 rebounds and four blocked shots and Mark Sakson scored a game-high 21 points to lead Valley View […]
shorts.content_distilled: 30 years ago Dunmore won its fourth straight Lynett Memorial Tournament championship with a 45-35 win over Scranton Prep.

shorts.title: Scranton's Kwanzaa event unites community through art and culture
shorts.title_distilled: Scranton's Kwanzaa event unites community through art and culture.
shorts.description: The Black Scranton Project's Kwanzaa open-mic jam in Scranton allowed performers to showcase their skills and guests to explore Kwanzaa history.
